items.sentence: Tom asked his father if he could go to the movies.
The doctor told Tom not to take a bath for a week.
The doctor told Tom that his hair would grow back.
The doctors did everything they could to save Tom.
It won\'t be as dangerous to do that as you think.
Let\'s concentrate on what needs to be done today.
Let\'s hope they call you if something goes wrong.
Do you want to know why I wasn\'t at Tom\'s party?
Can you introduce me to someone who speaks French?
Could you open the door for me? My hands are full.
